effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move’s type is the type corresponding to that item. Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.

short_effect.sun_moon: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move’s type varies depending on the kind of Plate the user is holding.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move’s type varies depending on the kind of Plate the user is holding.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user releases countless shots of light at the target. This move’s type varies depending on the kind of Plate the user is holding.
